page.title: 09GREENKNOWE TOWER
page.content: People three hundred years ago lived in stone towers called peel towers. Peel towers were used in the Borders as protection against the English. A typical example is Greenknowe tower.Greenknowe tower is on the outskirts of Greenknowe estate and just outside Gordon.The owners were the Lyal family who were Scottish lairds. The state of Greenknowe tower is quite good considering it has been left to crumble for many years.The tower is almost complete except for the third and fourth floors which were taken out when the Lyal family moved. There are five floors which consist of a dining room,dungeon,cellar,bedrooms, kitchen,hall and a servants quarter.To gain access to the tower you have to ask Mr Forsyth for the key.His job is to make sure the tower is safe.
